item.title: The SSE(server sent event) example
item.description: SSE establishes a one-way communication channel from server to client over HTTP. Unlike WebSockets’ bidirectional connection, SSE maintains an open HTTP connection for server-to-client updates. Think of it as a radio broadcast: the server (station) transmits, and clients (receivers) listen. The LLM completion API is most use SSE event to interactive with human in chat web ui The directory level look like following this 1├── bin 2│ ├── Activate.ps1 3│ ├── activate 4│ ├── activate.
